overview: The film "Bam Bala" is the story of siblings named Hina and Amir Ali, who seek help from a doll named Bam Bala to reconcile their parents. Bam Bala is a doll that helps all children achieve their dreams. In a part of the film, all the adults in the city are turned into statues by his hand so that the children can do whatever they want happily and regardless of their concerns.
title: ‌Bam Bala
